{{Infobox Berry |name = #02 Chesto |image = [[File:Chesto.png]] |caption = This Berry's thick skin and fruit are very tough and dry tasting. However, every bit of it can be eaten. |growtime = 40s |harvest = 3 berries |replant = 50% |points = 6 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chesto''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-5s || 5-15s || 15-25s || 25-40s || 40-80s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:ChestoTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:ChestoTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:ChestoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #02 Chesto |image = [[File:Chesto.png]] |caption = This Berry's thick skin and fruit are very tough and dry tasting. However, every bit of it can be eaten. |growtime = 40s |harvest = 3 berries |replant = 50% |points = 6 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chesto''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]]. It can be dropped randomly from defeated Pokémon. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !!
